5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Buhainah:“The Prophet (ﷺ) offered prayer, I think it was the ‘Asr, and in the second Rak’ah he stood up before he sat. Before he said the Salam, he prostrated twice.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ قَامَ مِنَ اثْنَتَيْنِ سَاهِيًا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who stands up after two Rak’ah by mistake
